alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 5:37PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Jefferson, east central Leon, northwestern Madison, southwestern Lowndes, southeastern Thomas and southwestern Brooks Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 536 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Quitman to 10 miles south of Boston to near Monticello. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Quitman, Valdosta, I-75 At Exit 16, Greenville, Alma, Dills, Grooverville, Hamburg, Drifton, Lovett, Nankin, Casa Blanco, Empress, Brooks Co A/p, Lake Miccosukee, Dixie, Aucilla, Cherry Lake and Lois. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
